name: Noto Serif Nyiakeng Puachue Hmong
description: Noto is a global font collection for writing in all modern and ancient languages. Noto Serif Nyiakeng Puachue Hmong is a modulated (“serif”) design for texts in the Nyiakeng Puachue Hmong script. It has multiple weights and 76 glyphs.
author: Google
